House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07952
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE MODERNIZATION OF THE PHILIPPINE NUCLEAR RESEARCH INSTITUTE, DEPARTMENT OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (PNRI-DOST), AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Mandates the PNRI to be the only government agency to promote the peaceful applications of nuclear and radiation science and technology to be a center of excellence for nuclear and radiation science and technology. Provides for the acquisition and upgrade of PNRI’s instruments, equipment and facilities and to phase out obsolete ones.
